readable.content: A little girl on the sidewalk close to the road is playing with three hula hoops A little girl plays with a hula hoop on the sidewalk in a residential neighborhood . A small child is playing with hula-hoops in a yard of a neighborhood . A small girl dressed in a red sweater playing hula hoop on a sidewalk in a neighborhood . The girl on the sidewalk is using a hula hoop .
